mapper.insert: insert into panda_user(user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_nick, user_email) values(NEXTVAL(user_seq), #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNick}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select count(*) from panda_user where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw}
mapper.update: update panda_user set user_nick = #{userNick}, user_email = #{userEmail} where user_id = #{userId}
update panda_user set USER_LOGIN_DATE = now() where user_id=#{userId}
